contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Airport | name = Kjeller Airport | nativename = | image = Kjeller 1913.jpeg | caption = Kjeller in 1913 with the [[Norwegian Army Air Service]]' first aircraft, Ganger Rolf | IATA = | ICAO = ENKJ | type = Public/Military | owner = | operator = [[Royal Norwegian Air Force]], [[Kjeller Aero Senter]] | city-served = | location = [[Kjeller]], [[Norway]] | elevation-f = 354 | elevation-m = 108 | coordinates = {{coord|59|58|10|N|011|02|20|E|type:airport_region:NO|display=inline,title|name=Kjeller Airport}} | website = | metric-rwy = y | r1-number = 12/30 | r1-length-f = 4,452 | r1-length-m = 1,357 | r1-surface = [[Asphalt]] | footnotes = Source: [[Aeronautical Information Publication|AIP]] at [[European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation|EUROCONTROL]]<ref name="AIP">[http://www.ead.eurocontrol.int/publicuser/protect/pu/main.jsp EAD Basic]</ref> }} '''Kjeller Airport''' {{airport codes||ENKJ}} is a military and [[general aviation]] airport located in [[Kjeller]], [[Norway]], near [[Lillestrøm]] and {{convert|9|NM|abbr=on|lk=in}} east northeast of [[Oslo]].<ref name="AIP"/> It has facilities for carrying out maintenance for aircraft belonging to the [[Royal Norwegian Air Force]]. Aviation has a long history at Kjeller. Kjeller is Norway's first airport, built in 1912. In the first part of the 20th century there was a [[Kjeller Flyfabrikk|small aircraft factory]] building military planes. There is now a small aircraft museum. The largest plane to have landed at Kjeller is a Boeing 737 and it is frequently used by [[C-130 Hercules]] transports. Vital medicines get flown into Kjeller for Ullevaal Hospital and Rikshospitalet; in nearby [[Oslo]]. ==Events== ===''Flydagen på Kjeller''=== An annual airshow is organized at the airport, where entrance is free-of-charge. More information, see http://www.flydagen.no ==Organizations operating at Kjeller== * [[Nedre Romerike Flyklubb]] * [[Oslo Flyveklubb]] * [[Kjeller Flyhistoriske Forening]] * [[Aeromech]] * [[HelikopterDrift]] * [[Hovet Avionics]] * [[Experimental Aircraft Association]] Chapter 573 Norway ==References== <references /> ==External links== {{commonscat|Kjeller Airport}} * [http://generator.firmanett.no/(or3q2xamejvziqz4vdaucf55)/generator.aspx?PID=176906&M=0&M=0/ Map with location] * [http://www.kjellerflyplass.no/ Kjeller Aero Senter (General Aviation airport authority)] * [http://www.stolsdokken.no/enkj.htm Unofficial weather information and webcam from the AFIS tower] {{Airports in Norway}} {{Royal Norwegian Air Force}} [[Category:Museums in Akershus]] [[Category:Skedsmo]] [[Category:Airports in Akershus]] [[Category:1912 establishments in Norway]] [[Category:Airports established in 1912]] [[Category:Aerospace museums in Norway]] [[Category:Luftwaffe airports in Norway]] {{norway-airport-stub}} {{Norway-museum-stub}}
